EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you - Resources from our work+life fit Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}}, You were missed at our â€œTaking Control of Your Work+Life "Fit" as an Independent Professional" webinar held on Thursday, January 30. Flexible work strategist and author Cali Williams Yost shared practical advice on managing your unique work+life fit on a day-to-day basis. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/38FVT5SY-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Cali%20Yost--1_30_14%20_Tweak%20it.pdf> Connect with Cali Williams Yost <http://www.linkedin.com/in/caliwilliamsyost>
